name: Degen Duck Crossing
description:
Degen Duck Crossing is a collaborative game built by X-Race and the Degen Duck Club.

The goal is to collect as much bread as you can and get you get your Degen duck across the river to safety. 

Compete with your friends and try to take out the top score on the leaderboard.

Use the arrow keys on desktop or the touch buttons on mobile.

X-Race Discord: https://discord.gg/JnpGw3sfXY

Degen Duck Club Discord: https://discord.gg/ugAuzMyqeN

Game developed in the GDevelop 5 game engine.

Royalty free music used from Twin-Musicom & Zappsplat
